snippet: Now effectively the prime minister’s No. 2, Foreign Minister Avigdor Lieberman invoked the Nazi era in castigating European leaders over support for the Palestinians.
abstract: Israel's foreign minister Avigdor Lieberman gives vent to government's anger over diplomatic gains by Palestinians paired with international rebukes for Israel, comparing Israel's situation to that of Czechoslovakia in 1938 before Nazi invasion.
lead_paragraph: Now effectively the prime minister’s No. 2, Foreign Minister Avigdor Lieberman invoked the Nazi era in castigating European leaders over support for the Palestinians.

headline.seo: Avigdor Lieberman Vents Anger at Europe, Invoking Nazi Era
headline.main: Israeli Minister Vents Anger at Europe
headline.print_headline: Top Israeli Official Vents Anger at Europe
